alert.note: Alert for Marion; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 13 at 1:02PM CDT until May 13 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Marion County in south central Iowa... East central Warren County in south central Iowa... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 102 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Sandyville, or 9 miles east of Indianola, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Pleasantville, Swan and Lake Red Rock. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
